data.name: Astonishing Baseball - God Mode
data.detailed_description:
Get a huge payroll and force trades on "God Mode" saves!

With this mode, you will be able to create "God Mode" saves. In a God Mode game, you start with a 300M payroll, can retire any player anytime, and force any trade you want!
data.about_the_game:
Get a huge payroll and force trades on "God Mode" saves!

With this mode, you will be able to create "God Mode" saves. In a God Mode game, you start with a 300M payroll, can retire any player anytime, and force any trade you want!
data.short_description: Get a huge payroll and force trades on "God Mode" saves

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N3450
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N3450
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
